div.pre: 1550 El Aweiniye, E of Tartus (anc. Ant- aradus), N. Phoenicia, 1941 Burial: c. 150 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 79 AR Aegae: 19 tetradr. Cyme: 43 tetradr. Myrina: 15 tetradr. Magnesia: 2 tetradr. Disposition: SNGvonA., 1594-5, 1636, 1638-9, 1663, 2042 Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
